attributes.action: Bring in a 5 year mandatory prison sentence for carrying a knife.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think and I can say 99% of the public feel that there should be a minimum 5 year prison sentence and I mean prison, not an open facility for anyone who is caught carrying a knife, there is no valid reason for anyone to carry one. This will be one of the only ways to start to tackle knife crime, build more prisons if there already over run. This is the only way.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
